channel.title: How do i chnage my server localhost? READD PLEASEE!
channel.description:
Ok i was wonering how i could make my server so that other people can play on my server but when i give them ip to connect it wont connect it says 'Error connecting to server' but the server is online also it lets me connect to the server so why not them? :S please help??? Thanks alot
[left][right][u][i][b]All Help Apreciated!! =)[/b][/i][/u][/right][/left]
